activities:
We collect personal information when individuals sign up to receive periodic updates and promotional materials from our company; make a purchase through the Company Features; or receive customer or technical support.

To receive periodic updates regarding our products and promotions and/or receive customer or technical support, we require individuals to provide us with their email address.  When an individual makes a purchase through the Company Features, individuals will also be required to provide a billing address and credit card or other payment information.  No information of this type will be collected unless the individual has registered for services that require it.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data used to fulfill online retail orders (email, name, address)
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
